name: confusion
description: This is a website for Ristorante Con Fusion

scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin aboutme.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/aboutme.html && usemin references.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/references.html
scripts.deploy: copyfiles -u 1 dist/* ../../justinthomsen.github.io/dist && copyfiles -u 2 dist/css/* ../../justinthomsen.github.io/dist/css && copyfiles -u 2 dist/img/* ../../justinthomsen.github.io/dist/img && copyfiles -u 1 js/* ../../justinthomsen.github.io/dist/js && copyfiles -u 2 dist/fonts/* ../../justinthomsen.github.io/dist/fonts
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copyfonts && npm run copycss && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
